text.div:
CEQsubscribe

OPERATION: CEQsubscribe

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

https://sequoiaproject.org/fhir/sphd-r4/OperationDefinition/ceqsubscribe

Operation for pushing a Bundle to the Notification Generator that includes the Subscription resource and the Resource indicating the end user of the notificaitons

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INsubscription1..1canonical

The subscription request being submitted

OUTreturn1..1OperationOutcome

If the operation outcome does not list any errors, then this is an indication that the operation would be expected to succeed

name: CEQsubscribe
title: Carequality Subscription Submission
description: Operation for pushing a Bundle to the Notification Generator that includes the Subscription resource and the Resource indicating the end user of the notificaitons

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: If the operation outcome does not list any errors, then this is an indication that the operation would be expected to succeed
